plants.name: Monstera Deliciosa Variegata (Large)
plants.description: Stunning variegated Monstera with large, fenestrated leaves. A true statement piece for any bright room. Needs bright indirect light.

plants.name: Fresh Peppermint
plants.description: Fast-growing and highly aromatic peppermint. Perfect for teas, cocktails, or adding fresh flavor to dishes. Thrives outdoors.

plants.name: Sweet Italian Basil
plants.description: Essential culinary herb with lush green leaves and a strong, sweet aroma. Best grown in sunny kitchen windows or gardens.

plants.name: Premium Lavender Seeds Packet
plants.description: High-germination lavender seeds. Grow your own fragrant oasis. Requires patience and well-draining soil.

plants.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig (Medium)
plants.description: Popular indoor tree known for its large, violin-shaped leaves. It can be finicky and requires stable conditions and bright filtered light.

plants.name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria)
plants.description: The ultimate beginner plant. Indestructible and an excellent air purifier. Tolerates low light and infrequent watering.

plants.name: Organic Rosemary Bush
plants.description: Woody, perennial herb with needle-like leaves and an intense fragrance. Great for cooking and drought-tolerant once established.

plants.name: Minimalist Ceramic Pot (White)
plants.description: Sleek matte white ceramic planter with a drainage hole and saucer. Fits most medium-sized indoor plants.

plants.name: Mixed Tulip Bulbs (Pack of 10)
plants.description: A vibrant mix of tulip bulbs ready for autumn planting. Expect a colorful display in early spring.

plants.name: ZZ Plant
plants.description: Featuring glossy, dark green leaves. The ZZ plant is incredibly tough, tolerating low light and neglect better than almost any other plant.

plants.name: Cherry Tomato Seeds
plants.description: Grow sweet, bite-sized cherry tomatoes at home. Highly productive and suitable for containers on sunny patios.

plants.name: Terracotta Pot (Classic)
plants.description: Traditional porous clay pot that allows roots to breathe. Ideal for plants that prefer drier soil, like succulents and cacti.
